hero.title: Develop your skills with
hero.subtitle: Over 250 courses created by experts to accelerate your professional and personal development. Join 50,000+ learners already transforming their careers.

features.title: Why choose Afthonios?

expert.title: Expert instructors
expert.description: Learn from recognized professionals in their field with proven hands-on experience.

flexible.title: Flexible learning
flexible.description: Study at your own pace, wherever and whenever you want, with 24/7 access on all your devices.

certificate.title: Recognized certificates
certificate.description: Get official certificates to showcase your new skills to employers.

quality.title: Quality content
quality.description: Courses regularly updated with the latest trends and best practices in the market.

global.title: Global access
global.description: Training available in French and English, accessible from anywhere in the world.
